name: Neon Snakes
description:
Host a game and have your friends join, then, once everyone's ready, a player can hit start and the game will begin.

The goal is to be the biggest snake of all. To do this, the players must try to eat as much food as possible. After 1 food is eaten, 2 more will spawn on the map.

The snake is controlled by the mouse pointer.

Keypad 0 to spawn a bot. Bots will all despawn when someone disconnects.
